awd_titl_txt: 1995 Particle Accelerator Conference and International      Conference on High-Energy Accelerators
awd_abstract_narration: 9507062  Schriber       A Particle Accelerator Conference, the latest in a  series that occur biennially, this year combined with the  International Conference on High Energy Accelerators, is  supported in part this grant.  this provides a forum for  presentation of the newest developments in accelerator  technology, and for exchanges of ideas to stimulate further  advances and generate new ideas.  The published proceedings,  available in print as well as on CD-ROM, are valuable  references for researchers in acceleration methods and  technology.  ***
